about_the_game:
Step into the wild with Wilderness Survival: The Conservationist, the groundbreaking simulation game where YOU become the protector of nature. Manage thriving animal populations on your vast properties, carefully breeding and improving their genetics to ensure their survival. Navigate the delicate balance of nature as you defend your herds from lurking predators and environmental challenges. Will you rise to the challenge and become the ultimate conservationist?

Wilderness Survival: The Conservationist is a realistic game management simulation. Each property will have a starting population that you can monitor.



You will be able to buy more animals that have better genetics, and add them to your herd. This will allow better quality animals to breed and their young will take on the new genes to grow into something magnificent. You can build your dream trophy lodge and also mount the ones you feel are worthy to be on your walls.



Natural predators may try to wreck your hopes for sustaining a beautiful herd, also as your animals age they will die when they get old. Never fear, you may come across a dead one in your travels around the property and could still harvest and mount it. Lastly, don't forget to eat and drink. You will need to stay alive to watch and see your herd grow. For fans of simulation games, we are bringing you something new here. Try to maintain a prosperous balance of animals, while surviving and protecting them from predators.

content_descriptors.notes: There is mild blood and violence.

name: Wilderness Survival: The Conservationist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 or FX6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Gforce 1660X
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 Super

short_description: Become a wildlife protector in Wilderness Survival: The Conservationist! Breed, manage, and defend thriving animal populations on your land. Balance predator threats, improve genetics, and maintain ecological harmony in this innovative simulation.
